Uses of Package
com.google.wave.api

Classes in com.google.wave.api used by com.google.wave.api
Annotation
          An annotation is metadata that augments a range of text in a Document.
Blip
          A blip is a unit of conversation in a Wave.
Element
          Elements are non-text content within a document.
ElementType
          Element Types.
Event
          An event captures changes made to a Wavelet, Blip, or Document in the Wave system.
EventType
          The types of events that Robots can process.
FormElement
          Form Elements allow users and robots to build forms for other users to interact with.
FormView
          The FormView is a view of a document that simplifies management of form elements.
Gadget
          Gadgets are external code that can be executed within a protected environment within a Wave.
GadgetView
          The GadgetView is a view of a document that simplifies management of gadgets and gadget state.
Range
          Defines a range for an annotation.
RobotMessageBundle
          Interface to a Robot Message Bundle used to process incoming Wave events.
RobotServlet
          An interface for processing Robot events.
StyledText
          StyledText represents a styled text region, that provides API to set or unset StyleType.
StyleType
          Text styles supported by Robots.
TextView
          The TextView is a view of a document that simplifies management of the text content that it contains.
Wavelet
          A Wavelet represents a part of a threaded conversation and is the unit of access control for a wave.
